# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.

# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.

# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_library(restricted-aws-aws-c-common)


target_compile_options(restricted-aws-aws-c-common PRIVATE
  -DAWS_COMMON_USE_IMPORT_EXPORT
  -DAWS_PTHREAD_GETNAME_TAKES_3ARGS
  -DAWS_PTHREAD_SETNAME_TAKES_2ARGS
  -DCJSON_HIDE_SYMBOLS
  -DHAVE_SYSCONF
  -DINTEL_NO_ITTNOTIFY_API
  -DAWS_AFFINITY_METHOD=AWS_AFFINITY_METHOD_NONE
  -DUSE_SIMD_ENCODING
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)

target_include_directories(restricted-aws-aws-c-common PUBLIC
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/aws/aws-c-common/generated/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/aws/aws-c-common/include
)

target_include_directories(restricted-aws-aws-c-common PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/aws/aws-c-common/source/external/libcbor
)

target_link_options(restricted-aws-aws-c-common INTERFACE
  -framework
  CoreFoundation
)
